data.what_is: Markitude is a very simple and visual tool that can perform advanced digital marketing campaigns without requiring technical knowledge.
data.product_description: Markitude is a very simple and visual tool that can perform advanced digital marketing campaigns without requiring technical knowledge.

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about markitude?
Markitude is a difficult tool to use. It not provides features as its competitors it compensates with its easy, to navigate interface. By using this there are many glitches or problems during my usage.

What do you dislike about markitude?
It seem a bit confusing at first once you get the hang of it Markitude becomes an asset. Its user interface is a bit confusing to use.The platform lacks capabilities for managing media and automating marketing tasks. It also falls short in providing customer interaction and timely communication.

What problems is markitude solving and how is that benefiting you?
There are limitations in terms of automation capabilities which may make it less suitable for businesses with marketing needs.There are many areas which need to improve.Moreover compared to marketing tools the browsing speed of their app is slower.

review_question_answers.question: What do you like best about markitude?
review_question_answers.answer: Markitude is a difficult tool to use. It not provides features as its competitors it compensates with its easy, to navigate interface. By using this there are many glitches or problems during my usage.

review_question_answers.question: What do you dislike about markitude?
review_question_answers.answer: It seem a bit confusing at first once you get the hang of it Markitude becomes an asset. Its user interface is a bit confusing to use.The platform lacks capabilities for managing media and automating marketing tasks. It also falls short in providing customer interaction and timely communication.

review_question_answers.question: What problems is markitude solving and how is that benefiting you?
review_question_answers.answer: There are limitations in terms of automation capabilities which may make it less suitable for businesses with marketing needs.There are many areas which need to improve.Moreover compared to marketing tools the browsing speed of their app is slower.

initial_reviews.review_title: Doesn't seem like website is even active
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about markitude?
I know and like that Markitude is a simple and visual tool that can perform advanced digital marketing campaigns without requiring technical knowledge. Making services for digital marketing easily accessed .. it helps you to automate and analyze your users, from lead visits to your web to their conversion as a loyal customer.

What do you dislike about markitude?
I don't believe the site is even active any longer. When you actually attempt to access their website it looks like the domain is for sale and no longer an active website.. so unfortunately there isn't much to say about it anymore without having a live site

What problems is markitude solving and how is that benefiting you?
When active it helps with social media management and marketing automation helping lead visits to your business and gain loyal and potential customers.

review_question_answers.question: What do you like best about markitude?
review_question_answers.answer: I know and like that Markitude is a simple and visual tool that can perform advanced digital marketing campaigns without requiring technical knowledge. review_question_answers.question: What problems is markitude solving and how is that benefiting you?
review_question_answers.answer: When active it helps with social media management and marketing automation helping lead visits to your business and gain loyal and potential customers.

What do you like best about markitude?

What do you dislike about markitude?
Markitude is simple to use but lack some features compare to competetive apps.

What problems is markitude solving and how is that benefiting you?
markitude helps to visualize our leads & automate the process for digital campain which helps us to reach the larger user base.

initial_reviews.review_title: Solution That helps customer to build there marketing effort
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about markitude?
This tools helps businesses to easily automate there marketing process and make there client interaction smooth and seamless.

It also  very cost-effective soltuion for your business

What do you dislike about markitude?
There is not such feature that we dislike in the tool.

But surely some addtional feature may surely give the tool an hands-on

What problems is markitude solving and how is that benefiting you?
Our primary goal with this tool is to make our customer interaction smooth and seamless. By using this tool we want timely and smooth communication with client.

It also  very cost-effective soltuion for your business

There is not such feature that we dislike in the tool.

But surely some addtional feature may surely give the tool an hands-on

review_question_answers.question: What problems is markitude solving and how is that benefiting you?
review_question_answers.answer: Our primary goal with this tool is to make our customer interaction smooth and seamless. By using this tool we want timely and smooth communication with client.

initial_reviews.review_title: A marketing tool which helps in understanding and dealing with customers efficiently
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about markitude?
Its is very easy to use and saves lot of time. It helps in dealing with customers.

Their customer support is also good and they solve any issue faced by user and answered all the question as and when it was required, which helped me in managing this marketing tool easily

What do you dislike about markitude?
There is nothing to dislike in this tool, i just want more feature packed tool, which can be used efficiently without any bugs.

Recommendations to others considering markitude:
Its a best tool for automation marketing. If you have small to large business, it can help in solving marketing issues and managing customer relation

What problems is markitude solving and how is that benefiting you?
We try to handle customers with this tool and helps in marketing. It helps in solving the problem realted to customer responses as and when required

initial_reviews.review_title: It was great working with markitude
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about markitude?
Working with markitude was overall a great experience but I really the fact that through markitude we we are offered marketing automatic software solution. Could not bf more thankful for this great feature. It saves tons of time

What do you dislike about markitude?
There is nothing that I dislike about this software

Recommendations to others considering markitude:
I highly recommend markitude if you are looking for live chat, marketing automation feature to use.

What problems is markitude solving and how is that benefiting you?
Right now I am just analyzing the different futures of markitude and I love it so far. I love the feature that it has for live chat

initial_reviews.review_title: It is a good so tool
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about markitude?
It's is easy to use and makes so fun. It's ability to suggest keywords is best. It also tells about the improvement in the contents.

What do you dislike about markitude?
Nothing much to dislike.  But I would like to see more features to come in. More features like ability to suggest hash tags for marketing on social media.

Recommendations to others considering markitude:
Yes,  use it,  it is easy to learn as well use.

What problems is markitude solving and how is that benefiting you?
So marketing for various products that my company have.
